holidays.title: National Eyewear Day
holidays.description: The good news? Today we can choose from virtually endless styles, shapes, and colors.

holidays.title: National Yo-Yo Day
holidays.description: It seems like yo-yos have been around forever and that's because they have; we're talking over 2,000 years!

holidays.title: Queensland Day
holidays.description: Did you know the British could have named Queensland — "Cooksland" — after British explorer James Cook?

holidays.title: Russian Language Day
holidays.description: It’s time to take a quick trip to the Eastern Hemisphere, because it's Russian Language Day!

holidays.title: Caves and Karst Day
holidays.description: Dive deep into the fascinating world of caves and karst to discover its wonders and splendor.

holidays.title: D-Day
holidays.description: More than 75 years after the end of World War II, the memories remain fresh.

holidays.title: Hari Raya Haji
holidays.description: It’s story-time as we celebrate an Islamic tale of devotion that birthed a worldwide event.

holidays.title: Memorial Day in South Korea
holidays.description: Remembering the brave, fallen soldiers of the Korean War, and all of South Korea.

holidays.title: National Applesauce Cake Day
holidays.description: National Applesauce Day is an opportunity to hone your culinary skills and treat your sweet tooth.

holidays.title: National Drive-In Movie Day
holidays.description: Today is the anniversary of the first-ever drive-in opening in the U.S.

holidays.title: National Gardening Exercise Day
holidays.description: Any gardener will tell you that squatting to pick weeds will get those quads burning.

holidays.title: National Higher Education Day
holidays.description: National Higher Education Day recognizes the importance of education in improving our lives.

holidays.title: Randol Fawkes Labour Day
holidays.description: Join the parade as we celebrate and show our appreciation this Randol Fawkes Labor Day.

holidays.title: Sacrifice Feast Eve
holidays.description: It is our prayer that Allah accepts your sacrifice and fulfills your desires in life.

holidays.title: T. T. Bank Holiday
holidays.description: Experience one of the most dangerous road racing championships on the planet.

holidays.title: Tabaski Day
holidays.description: It’s time to bow in prayer as we celebrate the Tabaski holiday!

holidays.title: Visually Impaired People Day
holidays.description: Visually Impaired People Day creates awareness about the needs of people with vision loss and impairment.

holidays.title: Waqfat Arafat Day
holidays.description: Let us explore the history behind Waqfat Arafat Day and understand its significance.

holidays.title: World Green Roof Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the contribution that green roofs make to reducing global carbon emissions.

holidays.title: World Pest Day
holidays.description: Book a date with your local pest control company on World Pest Day.

holidays.title: Carole Baskin’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the Queen of Cat Ladies everywhere, no plight of animals is too large to defeat.

holidays.title: Neha Kakkar’s Birthday
holidays.description: Neha Kakkar is known as the queen of pop music in Bollywood.

holidays.title: Toby Wallace’s Birthday
holidays.description: From “Lucky Country” to “Babyteeth,” Toby continues to surprise us with his talent.
